ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Maxxed stats?
ygData.msgSnippet: yep every stat has always maxxed at 255.  i hope this either goes up in expansion (not likely) or they make the diminshing returns after 200 just go away (umm,
ygData.messageBody:
yep every stat has always maxxed at 255. i hope this either goes up in
expansion (not likely) or they make the diminshing returns after 200 just go
away (umm, also not likely).

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L48 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server



> From: "Bill Mann" <dabard@...>
>
> A guildbro of mine was messing around to see how much Dex he
> could build up
> (buffs, items, etc). At 255, he hit a wall. No matter what
> he did after
> that, his Dex rose no higher. Anyone else ever notice that?
> I had never
> seen Verant say whether or not there was a definite maximum
> limit on stats.
>
> -=B=-
> Barrd Talespinner
> 27th
> The Rathe
